overview:
John Riis Mortensen - Investment Director, Vecata A/S since 2004.

John Riis Mortensen was previously Head of Treasury and Project Manager in Dandy Ltd., a company in the Bagger-Sorensen Group that was sold to Cadbury-Schweppes Plc. in 2002. John Riis Mortensen continued as Head of Treasury with Cadbury-Schweppes Plc. from 2002 until 2004.

Prior to this John Riis Mortensen worked as a project consultant with Danish Industry (DI), which is a private organisation funded, owned and managed entirely by 11.000 Danish companies within the manufacturing, trade and service industry.

John Riis Mortensen holds board positions in a number of the companies in the Vecata portfolio.

John Riis Mortensen graduated as Master of Science in Economics from Aarhus University in 1992.
